#FreeSpeechAtWork is why we include "the views I express here are my own, and not that of my employer" - but as an American citizen, with rights - you should NEVER work for someone that doesn't empower you to include that statement on your public presence. They have the right to ask you to separate your opinions and theirs - but you ALWAYS have the right to express yours.
Gaming Colleagues - what are the best developer-focused conferences that you have attended and why?    Would love your insight as we plan for 2018!
Passionate about Graphics and Procedural Technology? Amazon Game Studios is working on some exciting initiatives in that space! Reach out to hear more!

Transferred to Amazon Game Studios in December 2016 to work with local teams doing incredible things.Owning and supporting all game engineering, and engineering leadership roles for our Southern California Studios; Irvine and San Diego.Deeply invested and focused on finding talent to help us build world class games, using AWS technology, and leveraging the power of Twitch.Constantly looking for top game engineering talent; AI, Physics, Gameplay, and Tools as well as leadership; Development Directors and Product Managers.

Based in Orange County, CA and responsible for hiring global talent for our Seattle HQ.Responsible for attracting, engaging, and managing top engineering talentOwned hiring for the AWS SDKs, AWS Documentation, and Web Developers for the Tools Org.Drove process changes and training for new recruiter on-boarding to decrease ramp-up time for new hires.Proactively worked with engineering teams and managers to ensure full recruiting participation and to give each team member an opportunity to build their team. Build creative recruiting mechanisms; happy hours, advanced sell calls, etc. in order to ensure high offer to hire conversion rates.

Beacon Hill Technologies, Beacon Hill Staffing Group’s technology specialty division, is a national IT staffing organization, operating across many industries, that provides contract, direct, consulting and project management services to top companies and their IT departments. From staff augmentation and project/business specific solutions to direct placement services, Beacon Hill Technologies’ dedicated team of recruiting and staffing experts consistently delivers quality IT professionals, including those with active security clearances, covering all the latest technologies, on a time-sensitive basis.My goal is to deliver a unique service, one where what is discussed on day one carries through when papers are signed, ultimate transparency.  My focus will be on your career goals and aligning the opportunities we have that match.  Great people, interesting projects, and exciting work; that's what we are here for.Whether start-ups or the Fortune 500, the public or private sector, Beacon Hill Technologies matches world class talent with exceptional opportunities keeping all involved way ahead of the curve in the dynamic IT marketplace.

Sole Local Recruiter for dual openings of two satellite branches, LA and San DiegoFirst 8 months focused heavily on lead generation and business developmentHighlighted target companies for focused lead generation, discovering hiring managers within each organization.Worked with Account Managers on targeting positions that will get MSAs signed.Participated in conference calls with hiring managers to technically qualify the role as well as gauge the culture.High call volume to generate leads and candidate submissionsPlaced professionals from help desk to  architects, spanning multiple domains from Bio-tech to education.Placements include; C# & Java developers, Linux Architects, business analysts, SSRS developers, technical project managers and business intelligence professionals.

summary: I'm a gamer, always have been: always will be. From Vanilla WoW to Survival crafting and Battle Royale to MOBA's, I play 'em all. Now I get to build teams that are taking new ideas, new technologies,  to build new games and create world class experiences. If you want to hear about what we're up to and what's brewing in Irvine and San Diego, let's chat!
